alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:30PM EDT until July 28 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Talbot County in eastern Maryland... Queen Anne`s County in northeastern Maryland... Central Caroline County in eastern Maryland... Southwestern Kent County in northeastern Maryland... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 930 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stevensville, or near Severn River, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Centerville, Chestertown, Centreville, Romancoke, Oakland, Ridgely, Rock Hall, Church Hill, Queen Anne, Old Town, Grasonville, Starr, Jumptown, Morgnec, Stevensville, Skipton, Langford, Chester, Overton and Starkey Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
